articles.author: RTÉ News
articles.title: Over 300,000 global coronavirus infections
articles.description: Follow our live blog on the latest Covid-19 developments both at home and abroad.
articles.content:
RTÉ.ie is the website of Raidió Teilifís Éireann, Ireland's National Public Service Broadcaster.RTÉ is not responsible for the content of external internet sites. Images courtesy of Sportsfile and Getty Images

articles.author: RTÉ News
articles.title: First French medic dies of coronavirus
articles.description: A French doctor caring for coronavirus patients has died of the illness, the first such death in the country that is grappling with the surging Covid-19 outbreak.
articles.content:
A French doctor caring for coronavirus patients has died of the illness, the first such death in the country that is grappling with the surging Covid-19 outbreak.
The 67-year-old emergency room medic worked at Compiegne hospital, north of Paris, the town's m… [+1207 chars]

articles.author: RTÉ News
articles.title: Lockdown not enough to defeat coronavirus - WHO
articles.description: Countries can not simply lockdown their societies to defeat coronavirus, the World Health Organization's top emergency expert said, adding that public health measures are needed to avoid a resurgence of the virus later on.
articles.content:
Countries can not simply lockdown their societies to defeat coronavirus, the World Health Organization's top emergency expert said, adding that public health measures are needed to avoid a resurgence of the virus later on.
Dr Mike Ryan said: "What we really … [+1715 chars]

articles.author: RTÉ Sport
articles.title: Dubai World Cup postponed due to coronavirus
articles.description: The Dubai World Cup, one of the world's richest horse races and a premier annual sporting event in the United Arab Emirates, will not go ahead this year amid the worsening coronavirus pandemic.
articles.content:
The Dubai World Cup, one of the world's richest horse races and a premier annual sporting event in the United Arab Emirates, will not go ahead this year amid the worsening coronavirus pandemic.
The 25th edition of the multi-race meet, scheduled for 28 March,… [+884 chars]

articles.author: RTÉ Sport
articles.title: Aussie Rules suspends season due to coronavirus
articles.description: The Australian Football League's attempt to forge on with the season despite the coronavirus outbreak lasted just one round before it was shut down on Sunday in the wake of a government crackdown on non-essential travel.
articles.content:
The Australian Football League's attempt to forge on with the season despite the coronavirus outbreak lasted just one round before it was shut down on Sunday in the wake of a government crackdown on non-essential travel.

articles.author: RTÉ Sport
articles.title: Marouane Fellaini tests positive for coronavirus
articles.description: Former Manchester United midfielder Marouane Fellaini has tested positive for coronavirus, his Chinese club Shandong Luneng have announced.
articles.content:
Former Manchester United midfielder Marouane Fellaini has tested positive for coronavirus, his Chinese club Shandong Luneng have announced.
Chinese media is reporting that the 32-year-old is in isolation at Jinan hospital, which specialises in infectious dis… [+525 chars]

articles.author: RTÉ Sport
articles.title: Coronavirus presents dope test hurdle for Tokyo Games
articles.description: Restrictions imposed due to the coronavirus pandemic have reduced the number of doping tests to a minimum, creating another hurdle for the Tokyo Olympics to clear to go ahead on time.
articles.content:
Restrictions imposed due to the coronavirus pandemic have reduced the number of doping tests to a minimum, creating another hurdle for the Tokyo Olympics to clear to go ahead on time.
